title: An Outlaw's Heart: A Southern Love Story
description: Russell is a changed man, but can he prove it to those he loves most?When Russell Stark returns to Fort Worth, he’s determined to begin a new life. But when he arrives at his mother’s homestead, he discovers that she is very ill and the woman he loved is still as beautiful and sweet as he remembered. With time running out, Russell must come to terms with both his future and his past.
author: Shelley Gray
